title: How to publish my book that I have done in Google Docs - Quora

response.answer_text: I write all of my books in Google Docs because I like the simple formatting tools, and that it backs up automatically to the cloud. If you’d like to publish, you can adhere to a few rules to ensure the document is formatted properly for that purpose. Don’t use the Tab key.Create a Title page and insert a Page Break (Ctrl Enter).Format each chapter heading with the Heading 1 Style.Insert a Page Break at the end of each chapter.At the beginning of you book, usually after the Title page, insert a Table of Contents by clicking Insert and select Table of contents from the drop-down menu.Download the document as a Word fileUpload the Word file to your publishing platform of choice and run through the troubleshooting to remove spelling and formatting errors.Hope that helps! Ava http://heyyoava.com
You can upload it here: Amazon Storywriter
